file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-25-02-04 - PSU READING LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PSU READING LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the PSU Reading Light. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-25-02-000-801-A PSU READING LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL PSU READING LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLA- ALL 33-25-02-400-801-A TION PSU READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY - RE- ALL 33-25-02-000-802-A MOVAL PSU READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY - IN- ALL 33-25-02-400-802-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-25-02 Page 1 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PSU READING LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the PSU reading light lamp. (2) You can remove the reading light assembly ( AMM TASK 33-25-02-000-802-A/400) from the PSU to make the removal of the reading light lens easier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-25-02-000-802-A/400 PSU READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-006-A (1) Open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them: (a) On the left power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 1/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 1). (b) On the right power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 2). – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 3/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-02 Page 2 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-006-A (1) Firmly hold the reading light lens (1) and the reading light fixture (2). (2) Push the reading light lens (1) and turn clockwise to unlock it. (3) Remove the reading light lens (1). (4) Carefully push the lamp (3) and turn counterclockwise to remove it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-02 Page 3 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT FOR 37 PASSENGERS PSU Reading Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 244 RH PSU 254 264 DET. A C B ZONES 233/243 253/263 LH PSU 2. READING LIGHT FIXTURE C DET. B D 1. READING LIGHT LENS DET. C 3. LAMP DET. D 145AMM330382.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-02 Page 4 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT FOR 16 PASSENGERS PSU Reading Light Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONES 233 243/244 253/254 263/264 DET. A B 2. READING LIGHT FIXTURE C 1. READING LIGHT LENS 3. LAMP DET. C DET. B 145AMM330537.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-25-02 Page 5 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PSU READING LIGHT LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the PSU reading light lamp. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-006-A (1) Put the lamp (3) in its installation position. (2) Carefully push the lamp (3) and turn it clockwise to lock it. (3) Push the reading light lens (1) and turn counterclockwise to lock it. I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-006-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from these circuit breakers and close them: (a) On the left power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 1/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 1). (b) On the right power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 2). – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 3/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-25-02 Page 6 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-02-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. PSU READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the PSU reading light assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-007-A (1) Open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them: (a) On the left power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 1/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 1). (b) On the right power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 2). – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 3 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 3/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 3). I. Removal (Figure 403) (Figure 404) SUBTASK 020-007-A (1) Unlock the PSU latch and carefully pull the PSU assembly (1) down. (2) Disconnect the two electrical connections (3). (3) Remove the circlip (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-25-02 Page 7 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Pull the reading light assembly (4) and remove it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-25-02 Page 8 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

CIRCLIP DET. B 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTIONS DET. C PSU LATCH (2) DET. D 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTIONS PSU LATCH (2) DET. B DET. C 4. READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY 145AMM330536.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-25-02 Page 10 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-25-02-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. PSU READING LIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the PSU reading light assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 403) (Figure 404) SUBTASK 420-007-A (1) Put the reading light assembly (4) in its installation position. (2) Fasten the reading light assembly (4) in the PSU (1) with the circlip (2). (3) Connect the two electrical connections (3). (4) Close the PSU assembly (1). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-007-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from these circuit breakers and close them: (a) On the left power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 1 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 1/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 1). (b) On the right power control and distribution box: – RDNG LT/ATTD CALL 2 (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/RDNG LT/ ATTD CALL 2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-25-02 Page 11 of 12 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
